item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (154 points | 95 comments)
2. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (107 points | 37 comments)
3. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (58 points | 2 comments)
4. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (146 points | 25 comments)
5. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (31 points | 9 comments)
6. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (43 points | discuss)
7. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (396 points | 112 comments)
8. Establishing an etiquette for LLM use on Libera.Chat (45 points | 32 comments)
9. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (27 points | 3 comments)
10. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (88 points | 39 comments)
11. Anti-scale: a response to AI in journalism (22 points | 15 comments)
12. 32k context length text embedding models (10 points | 1 comment)
13. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (13 points | 7 comments)
14. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (42 points | 6 comments)
15. 2007 Boston Mooninite Panic (12 points | 2 comments)
16. There Is No Business Case for Civilization (10 points | discuss)
17. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (21 points | 1 comment)
18. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (29 points | 2 comments)
19. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (148 points | 20 comments)
20. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (134 points | 32 comments)
21. 1 Dataset. 100 Visualizations (43 points | 14 comments)
22. DreamSim: Learning New Dimensions of Human Visual Similarity (2023) (3 points | discuss)
23. The biggest blocker to LibreOffice adoption? LibreOffice (23 points | 19 comments)
24. Music as Language (2019) [pdf] (35 points | 6 comments)
25. The Physics of Butterfly Wings (42 points | 7 comments)
26. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (279 points | 61 comments)
27. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (8 points | discuss)
28. Energy is frame-dependent, infrastructure of energy is frame-independent (2020) (10 points | 5 comments)
29. MaXX Interactive Desktop -- the little brother of the great SGI Desktop on IRIX (144 points | 62 comments)
30. Dear sir, you have built a compiler (2022) (337 points | 191 comments)
